bio: Writing including interviews, analysis & deep dives about tech & events in web3
impactDescription: The impact will be meaningful to both native and new/beginner users. A cross platform approach to music releasing was backed by us cataloging every step to make it easier for others (mirror.xyz) and leveraging collectibles has helped on board new musicians/artists to the space.
contributionDescription: I write articles unpacking the virtues, tools, tech, people, & ethos underpinning web3. From decentralised dispute resolution to DAO governance - I tell stories, undertake analysis, & share learning. I would like to continue to do so, expanding the scope and scale of interviews as well as topics covered.

contributionLinks.description: Writing educational content e.g. smart contract development and self custody
Releasing music on Zora and sound xyz
